name: I'm Sure of It
description:
My entry for 2021's InkJam, a 72-hour game jam with the theme "You'll think of something."

Currently runs on Windows and Android. I can't make any promises for iOS/Mac, sorry! I'll try to make that work in the future.

Use the mouse to click your selections, or use 1-9 on your keyboard to select the corresponding option. If you misclick, you can use the arrow keys to undo and redo your choices.

---
